item.title: Fundamentals of NSNotificationCenter in Swift
item.description: Updated on September 19, 2016 – Xcode 8 & Swift 3.0 The goal of this post is to help you grasp the fundamentals of using NSNotificationCenter in your Swift iOS app. The topic isn’t necessarily new, and there’s no difference except syntax between Objective-C and Swift implementations involving NSNotificationCenter. Even still, I’m hoping to add to the understanding of this useful tool by giving a fully-working example on GitHub (Swift 2.
